remarks: Part of proof of Lemma C in [Crawley] p. 112.  (Contributed by NM, 25-May-2012.)
statement:
cdlemc2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemc2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemc2.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlemc2.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemc2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemc2.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemc2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ ( ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) ) -> ( F ` Q ) .<_ ( ( F ` P ) .\/ ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ W ) ) ) $.
